info.title: Postmark API
info.description: Postmark helps deliver and track transactional emails for web applications. In a nutshell, the service replaces SMTP (or Sendmail) with a far more reliable, scalable and care-free environment.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: requiredThis request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.

parameters.name: fromdate
parameters.description: Filter stats up to the date specified. e.g. 2014-02-01

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Filter stats up to the date specified. e.g. 2014-02-01

parameters.name: todate
parameters.description: Filter stats up to the date specified. e.g. 2014-02-01

parameters.name: X-Postmark-Server-Token
parameters.description: requiredThis request requires server level privileges. This token can be found on the Credentials tab under your Postmark server.
